entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:49 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 8:39 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
